alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 10:57AM MST until January 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...The Arco Desert, Upper Snake Plain, Teton Valley, Big Hole Mountains, Blackfoot Mountains, and Caribou Range, including but not limited to Craters of the Moon, Idaho National Laboratory, Mud Lake, St. Anthony, Rexburg, Rigby, Idaho Falls, Ammon, Bancroft, Grace, Soda Springs, Ashton, Driggs, Victor, Swan Valley, and Wayan. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
